content: All due respect, but tell that to the Pataxós, the Washoe, the Guarani Kaiowa, the Quechua, the Cherokee, the Yanomami, the Sioux, the Tupiniquins and all the original peoples, natives, first nations of the entire American continent. The entire idea of the West is indeed an idea of conquest of the weak by the strong, with all the racism and other phobias that are associated with that.
